page.title: 08LEISURE IN CREDENHILL
page.content: SOME FAMILES GO FOR DAY TRIPS,FOR WALKS OR PICNICS. THERE ARE FETES AND RAFT RACES FOR CHARITY.SOME DADS PLAY CRICKET OR ENTER RAFT RACES AND THE WHOLE FAMILY GOES ALONG. WE PLAY IN THE VILLAGE PARK,SOME OF US ON OUR B.M.X BIKES.TWO BOYS ENTER SCRAMLING MOTOR BIKE COMPETITIONS, SOME FISH ON THE POND .SOME GIRLS ATTEND DANCING CLASSES FOR DISCO,MODERN,BALLET AND TAP. TEN GIRLS ARE IN GIRL GUIDES AND SIX BOYS ARE IN SCOUTS.THEY GO TO CAMP AND ENTER COMPETITIONS,SWIM AND GO CANOENING. ONE BOY SINGS IN THE CHURCH CHOIR. WE GO ON HOLIDAY WITH OUR PARENTS , SOME ABROAD BUT MOSTELY TO THE SEASIDE.YOUNG ADVENTURE HOLIDAYS ARE POPULAR BUT NONE OF OUR CHILDREN TAKE PART. WINTER DISCOS, T.V AND COMPUTER GAMES
